turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I need to order a coffee from Starbucks.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Which store would you like it from?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: The Starbucks on 10th and Couch in NW.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Ok, NW 10th and Couch. What would you like?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I want a Caffe Latte.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: What size Latte would you like?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Grande.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: What type of milk?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I'd like it to have whole milk.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Ok. Grande cafe latte with whole milk. Anything else?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: No thanks!

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Do you want to order any food?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: No, i'm not hungry

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: OK, let me put in your order.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Thanks

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: I just sent the order to the Starbucks at 1039 NW Couch. Your order should be ready soon.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Ok!

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Your receipt has been emailed to you. Is there anything else I can help you with?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: No, that's all thanks!

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Ok! Have a good day.
